zimbra_domain_delete_modal_content: Are you sure you want to delete the domain from the Zimbra server?
zimbra_domain_delete_modal_message_disab: Your domain is in use. You cannot delete this domain while it is still in use.
zimbra_domain_delete_success_message: Your deletion request has been submitted. It will be executed in a few moments.
zimbra_domain_delete_error_message: Unable to submit your deletion request. {{ error }}
zimbra_domain_delete_modal_message_disab: There is at least one email account still linked to this domain name.
Please delete the linked email accounts before deleting your domain name.
